channel.title: Batch on Ashwin Narayan
channel.description: Recent content in Batch on Ashwin Narayan

item.title: Hugo Web Development Workflow on Windows
item.description: As I mentioned in my first article on this blog, I’m now using Hugo, the static site generator to build my personal website. Due to the needs of my work environment (mostly because I need to use MS Word and certain MATLAB features on a regular basis), I’ve been primarily using Windows as my operating system for the past year or so. Having used Linux for a long time, I definitely missed the conveniences offered by shell scripting and other command line tools.
